location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, reminding that the Governor requests a monthly reportof the Balance of Cash in the Residence's Treasury.
